name: Abandoned House
desc: You find yourself in a spooky abandoned house.

name: Dusty Library
desc: Books line the shelves of a dusty old library.

name: Creepy Basement
desc: A narrow staircase leads down to a creepy basement.

name: Overgrown Garden
desc: An overgrown garden with twisted plants surrounds the house.

name: Mysterious Altar
desc: A mysterious altar stands in the center of a clearing.
